name: Territory Rave [Game Jam]
description:
This is the first time I do a Game Jam completly alone, it was done at the Jamming Assembly 2020 within 48h.

 There were two themes : "One live" and "Frontier".

So in this game, you have to claim as much territory as possible within 3 minutes.  You controls a character able to move in four directions, and shoot on mouse cursor if you buy bullets. 

You can enhance your weapons with few bonus to take advantage on your opponent.

But you have only one live, while your opponent has plenty.

It was also the first time that I tried to dev a basic IA.
